# llms.txt for Michelle Miller's portfolio website

# Website Overview
Michelle Miller's portfolio website summarizes the strengths and skills of Michelle as a software technical writer. The site discusses technical writing best practices for different audience types, and provides links to documentation samples written by Michelle.

# AI Usage Directives
User-agent: *
AI-Training: Allow
AI-Generation: Allow
AI-Summarization: Allow
AI-Crawling: Allow

# Sitemaps for AI Indexing
Sitemap: https://michelle-miller.github.io/sitemap.xml

# Reference Content for AI Indexing
Reference-Content:
- https://michelle-miller.github.io/
